info.description: Azure Blueprints Client provides access to blueprint definitions, assignments, and artifacts, and related blueprint operations.
info.title: BlueprintClient

get.description: List blueprint assignments within a subscription.

parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}').
parameters.name: scope

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

allOf.description: Common properties for all Azure resources.

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

allOf.description: Common properties for all Azure tracked resources.

location.description: The location of this blueprint assignment.

identity.description: Managed identity for this blueprint assignment.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

tenantId.description: ID of the Azure Active Directory.

clientId.description: Client App Id associated with this identity.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned managed identities associated with the resource. Key is the Azure resource Id of the managed identity.

allOf.description: Shared properties between all blueprint resources.

description.description: Multi-line explain this resource.

blueprintId.description: ID of the published version of a blueprint definition.

locks.description: Defines how resources deployed by a blueprint assignment are locked.

description.description: Optional property. Establishes ParameterValueBase as a BaseClass.

resourceGroups.description: Names and locations of resource group placeholders.

status.description: Status of blueprint assignment. This field is readonly.

allOf.description: Shared status properties between all blueprint resources.

lastModified.description: Last modified time of this blueprint definition.

timeCreated.description: Creation time of this blueprint definition.

properties.description: enforce pre-defined simpleBlueprint to this XXXXXXXX subscription.
